question: Most of the time do you find yourself taking actions for the plans you have set for your daily life?
Do you often find yourself having negative thoughts, repetitively?
Do you feel bothered by this?
How do you feel when you achieve your goals?
Most of the time, do you feel overwhelmed in daily life?
On average, do you wake up feeling rested in the morning?
Most of the time, do you find yourself being present in the moment?
